com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client
Class RhizosphereOptions<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.RhizosphereOptions<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The models' type of the Rhizosphere visualization these options will be given to.
public class RhizosphereOptions<T>
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

Rhizosphere configuration options. Refer to Rhizosphere reference tables for a more complete explanation of each option, including defaults.

Instances of this class cannot be reused across multiple visualizations. Each visualization must be given its dedicated RhizosphereOptions instance.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

Nested Class Summary
static class RhizosphereOptions.LayoutConstraints
          A map of constraints for the area that Rhizosphere will use to lay out models' renderings.

          Enumeration of logging levels that the Rhizosphere visualization can use for client-side logging.

Returns:
The options instance.

setAllowConfigFromUrl

public final void setAllowConfigFromUrl(boolean allowConfigFromUrl)
Allow the visualization to extract parameters from the current document location URL.

setLogLevel

public final void setLogLevel(RhizosphereOptions.LogLevel level)
Sets the logging level for the Rhizosphere library.

Parameters:
level - The log level to use.

setEnableAnims

public final void setEnableAnims(boolean enableAnims)
Whether Rhizosphere should use animation to smooth transitions such as layouts and dynamic filtering.

setEnableHTML5History

public final void setEnableHTML5History(boolean enableHTML5History)
Whether to use HTML5 History (if supported by the browser) to keep track of Rhizosphere state.

setEnableLoadingIndicator

public final void setEnableLoadingIndicator(boolean enableLoadingIndicator)
Whether to display some form of load indicator (such as a progress bar) while the Rhizosphere visualization is loading.

setShowErrorsInViewport

public final void setShowErrorsInViewport(boolean showErrorsInViewport)
Whether user-visible notifications should be displayed in the visualization viewport in response to visualization errors.

setCacheDimensions

public final void setCacheDimensions(boolean cacheDimensions)
Whether Rhizosphere should cache renderings' dimensions. Greatly improves layout performance, but may result in layout bugs if the models you are visualizing change their rendering dimensions arbitrarily after the visualization initialization.

setPlatform

public final void setPlatform(java.lang.String platform)
Forces Rhizosphere UI to adapt itself to the specified target platform.

setDevice

public final void setDevice(java.lang.String device)
Forces Rhizosphere UI to adapt itself to the specified target device, bypassing device detection from the user-agent.

setTemplate

public final void setTemplate(java.lang.String template)
Forces Rhizosphere UI to use the specified layout template and chrome.

getLayoutConstraints

public final RhizosphereOptions.LayoutConstraints getLayoutConstraints()
Returns a configurable set of layout constraints, that Rhizosphere will enforce during layout operations.

setMetaModel

public final void setMetaModel(RhizosphereMetaModel metamodel)
Sets the visualization metamodel. Metamodels set via options take precedence over the other ones (both automatically inferred and explicitly provided to Rhizosphere instances).

setMetaModelFragment

public final void setMetaModelFragment(RhizosphereMetaModel metamodel)
Sets a visualization metamodel fragment. The fragment will be merged with the main visualization metamodel (either automatically inferred or explicitly given to the Rhizosphere instance these options are bound to).

Metamodel configuration defined here takes precedence, hence this method can be used to customize and tweak the default metamodel adopted by the visualization.

setRenderer

public final void setRenderer(RhizosphereRenderer<T> renderer)
Sets the visualization renderer. Renderer set via options take precedence over the other ones.

Parameters:
renderer -

getNativeRenderer

public final NativeRenderer<T> getNativeRenderer()
Returns the native renderer associated to the received renderer, if any. Should not be invoked by anyone outside the Rhizosphere framework.

setAutoRendererMaster

public final void setAutoRendererMaster(java.lang.String arMaster)
Defines which column in a Google Visualization DataTable represents the 'master' field that should be used in Rhizosphere models' renderings. This option is only useful to customize the automatic renderer used by GVizRhizosphere when no explicit renderer is provided.

setAutoRendererSize

public final void setAutoRendererSize(java.lang.String arSize)
Defines which column in a Google Visualization DataTable should be used to generate the 'size' scaling and legend. This option is only useful to customize the automatic renderer used by GVizRhizosphere when no explicit renderer is provided.

setAutoRendererColor

public final void setAutoRendererColor(java.lang.String arColor)
Defines which column in a Google Visualization DataTable should be used to generate the 'color' scaling and legend. This option is only useful to customize the automatic renderer used by GVizRhizosphere when no explicit renderer is provided.

setAutoRendererDefaults

public final void setAutoRendererDefaults(boolean arDefaults)
Whether the 'master', 'size' and 'color' fields should be automatically located when no explicitly specified. This option is only useful to customize the automatic renderer used by GVizRhizosphere when no explicit renderer is provided.

setAutoRendererNumFields

public final void setAutoRendererNumFields(int arNumFields)
Defines how many fields (columns) from a Google Visualization DataTable should be displayed in Rhizosphere models' renderings. This option is only useful to customize the automatic renderer used by GVizRhizosphere when no explicit renderer is provided.
